title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, April 3, 2020
description: On this day in 1968, Martin Luther King, Jr., said, “Let us move on in these powerful days, these days of challenge to make America what it ought to be.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1968, Martin Luther King, Jr., said, “Let us move on in these powerful days, these days of challenge to make America what it ought to be.”
